quotes.quote: Taking care of yourself is one of the hardest jobs- don't ever let anyone tell you otherwise. It is much easier to take care of others.
quotes.author: Charity Shumway

quotes.quote: I have come to believe that caring for myself is not self-indulgence. Caring for myself is an act of survival.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich
